name: PKPaymentErrorKey
desc: Additional details about an error on the Apple Pay sheet.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Create an error key given the raw value.

items.name: static let postalAddressUserInfoKey: PKPaymentErrorKey
items.desc: Payment error key that indicates errors with the postal address.

items.name: static let contactFieldUserInfoKey: PKPaymentErrorKey
items.desc: Payment error key that indicates errors with the contact information.
